mapper.select: select A.imgBoardId ,A.title ,A.writer ,A.filename ,A.filepath ,to_char(A.createdDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') createdDate ,A.rnum FROM ( SELECT A.imgBoardId, A.title, A.writer, A.filename, A.createdDate, A.filepath, row_number() over(order by imgBoardId desc) as rnum, ceil(row_number() over(order by imgBoardId desc)/10)-1 as pg FROM imgBoard A )A where pg = #{pg}
select A.imgBoardId ,A.title ,A.writer ,A.filename ,A.filepath ,A.createdDate from imgBoard A where A.imgBoardId = #{imgBoardId}
